item.description:
"A joyous, daring fusion of the old and new!" says the Boston Globe about this modern ballet featuring our very own prima ballerina - Janelle!! If you have ever thought about going to go see a ballet, now is the time!!!

The Urban Nutcracker in a nut shell:

- Follows the story line of E.T.A. Hoffman's 19th century fairy tale set in contemporary Boston.

- Fuses ballet, swing, hip hop, and urban tap with the classical score of Tchaikovsky and the pulsating beat of Duke Ellington.

- Celebrates the rich diversity of Boston's urban communities and spotlights the talent of over 70 area children.

- Showcases an incredible array of set designs & costumes by Rebecca Cross.

“Instead of trying to get around the ‘Nutcracker,’ BalletRox director Tony Williams, a former principal dancer with Boston Ballet, trans-formed the ballet into a multicultural celebration reflective of the world we live in... this is a ‘Nutcracker’ with attitude.”

Sounds good, huh??

RSVP soon, so we can get tickets! If we are more than 15 we can get a group discount!!!

I will be in Germany, like I said in my previous e-mail to you guys, but I will keep checking the web-site regularly and get the tickets as soon as I return from Germany!

Hope to see many of you at the ballet! Let's get into the Christmas-spirit together!!

Hanna
item.name: Ballet Rox presents: Urban Nutcracker!
